title: "quarto use"

## NAME

quarto use - 

## SYNOPSIS

```bash
quarto use [OPTIONS]
```

## DESCRIPTION

```

Usage:   quarto use <type> [target]
Version: 1.8.26                    

Description:

  Automate document or project setup tasks.

Options:

  -h, --help   - Show this help.                   
  --no-prompt  - Do not prompt to confirm actions  

Commands:

  help      [command]  - Show this help or the help of a sub-command.        
  template  <target>   - Use a Quarto template for this directory or project.
  binder               - Configure the current project with Binder support.  
```
